useCase.name: Manage Environment
useCase.trigger: actorName initiates the environment modification process.

mainSequence.step: actorName requests environment modification via CLI by calling caade-environment-modify().
CLI forwards the modification request to the server (caade) by calling environment/modify().
actorName requests environment modification via Web by calling environment/modify().
Web forwards the modification request to the server (caade) by calling environment/modify().
